_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTIO: The APaginationPages component renders page navigation only. It emits update:offset so the parent can load the next slice of items while keeping the current page in sync.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_PROPS_TOTAL_COUNT_DE: Total number of items in the data set. Used to calculate the number of pages and the button range.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_PROPS_DISABLED_DESCR: Disables page buttons and navigation controls.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_PROPS_LIMIT_DESCRIPT: Number of items per page. Together with offset it defines the current page.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_PROPS_MAX_PAGES_DESC: Maximum amount of page buttons that may be shown at once.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_PROPS_MODE_DESCRIPTI: Navigation layout mode: normal, short, or loadMore.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_PROPS_OFFSET_DESCRIP: Index of the first item on the current page. The component emits update:offset when navigation changes.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_PROPS_TEXTS_DESCRIPT: Object with translation keys or text labels used by the pager.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_GROUP_MAX_PAGES_DESC: Use the slider to change max-pages and see how the button range is trimmed.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_GROUP_DISABLED_DESCR: Toggle disabled to block all page navigation.
_A_PAGINATION_PAGES_GROUP_MODE_DESCRIPTI: Choose between the short and normal layouts.
